author: Caroline Linton
title: Texas attorney general says gun stores are "essential"
description: Texas has not declared a statewide stay-at-home order, but many local jurisdictions have issued them.
content: Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton declared Friday that gun stores can stay open amid the coronavirus pandemic even as many jurisdictions within the state have issued stay-at-home orders. Paxton's nonbinding opinion says "municipal and county authorities may n… [+2687 chars]
